comment: Bluetooth LE advertising callbacks, used to deliver advertising operation status.

variables.name: ADVERTISE_FAILED_DATA_TOO_LARGE
variables.comment: * Failed to start advertising as the advertise data to be broadcasted is larger than 31 bytes.

variables.name: ADVERTISE_FAILED_TOO_MANY_ADVERTISERS
variables.comment: Failed to start advertising because no advertising instance is available.

variables.name: ADVERTISE_FAILED_ALREADY_STARTED
variables.comment: Failed to start advertising as the advertising is already started.

variables.name: ADVERTISE_FAILED_INTERNAL_ERROR
variables.comment: Operation failed due to an internal error.

variables.name: ADVERTISE_FAILED_FEATURE_UNSUPPORTED
variables.comment: This feature is not supported on this platform.

methods.name: public void onStartSuccess(AdvertiseSettings settingsInEffect)
methods.comment:
* Callback triggered in response to {@link BluetoothLeAdvertiser#startAdvertising} indicating
     * that the advertising has been started successfully.
     *
     * @param settingsInEffect The actual settings used for advertising, which may be different from
     *     what has been requested.

methods.name: public void onStartFailure(int errorCode)
methods.comment:
* Callback when advertising could not be started.
     *
     * @param errorCode Error code (see ADVERTISE_FAILED_* constants) for advertising start
     *     failures.
